name: ngpxms

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, cms))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cxms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, cxms))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cxms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, cxms))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ *MetSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cxms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, cxms))

comment: A normed group is a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
